name: Goku
bio: The main protagonist of the Dragon Ball series.

name: Vegeta
bio: Goku's rival and former villain turned anti-hero.

name: Gohan
bio: Goku's first son and one of the most powerful characters in the series.

name: Piccolo
bio: Originally a villain, he becomes one of Goku's closest allies.

name: Krillin
bio: Goku's best friend and one of the most skilled human fighters.

name: Tien
bio: A disciplined warrior and former rival of Goku.

name: Yamcha
bio: A former desert bandit and one of Goku's earliest allies.

name: Chiaotzu
bio: Tien's best friend and a small, telekinetic human.

name: Goten
bio: Goku's second son and the youngest Super Saiyan in history.

name: Trunks
bio: Vegeta's son and a skilled time traveler.

name: Android 18
bio: Originally a human turned into a cyborg by Dr. Gero.

name: Android 17
bio: Android 18's twin brother and a former villain.

name: Frieza
bio: One of the series' main antagonists and the emperor of Universe 7.

name: Cell
bio: A bio-engineered being created from the cells of various characters.

name: Majin Buu
bio: A powerful magical being created by the wizard Bibidi.

name: Beerus
bio: The God of Destruction of Universe 7 and one of the strongest characters in the series.

name: Whis
bio: Beerus' martial arts teacher and the guide of Universe 7's Gods of Destruction.

name: Bulma
bio: Vegeta's wife and one of the most intelligent characters in the series.

name: Chi-Chi
bio: Goku's wife and the mother of Gohan and Goten.

name: Videl
bio: Gohan's wife and a skilled martial artist.

name: Mr. Satan
bio: The World Martial Arts Champion and a recurring character in the series.

name: Turtle
bio: Master Roshi's pet and companion.

name: Master Roshi
bio: Goku and Krillin's martial arts teacher and a perverted hermit.

name: Yajirobe
bio: A samurai-like character who aids the Z Fighters in various battles.

name: Kami
bio: The Guardian of Earth and the creator of the Dragon Balls.

name: King Piccolo
bio: The original incarnation of Piccolo and one of the series' main villains.

name: Raditz
bio: Goku's older brother and one of the first Saiyan villains in the series.

name: Nappa
bio: Vegeta's former partner and a member of the Saiyan Army.

name: Ginyu
bio: The captain of the Ginyu Force, a team of elite mercenaries.

name: Recoome
abilities: Eraser Gun, Recoome Ultra Fighting Bomber
bio: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his massive size and strength.

name: Burter
bio: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his incredible speed.

name: Jeice
bio: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his flamboyant personality.

name: Guldo
bio: A member of the Ginyu Force known for his psychic powers.

name: Dende
bio: A young Namekian who becomes the new Guardian of Earth after Kami.

name: Mr. Popo
bio: Kami's assistant and a loyal servant of the Guardian of Earth.

name: Shenron
bio: The wish-granting dragon summoned by collecting the seven Dragon Balls.

name: Broly
bio: A Saiyan with an uncontrollable power that makes him one of the series' most dangerous villains.

name: Bardock
bio: Goku's father and a former member of the Saiyan Army.

name: Caulifla
bio: A Saiyan from Universe 6 and the leader of a group of Saiyan punks.

name: Kale
bio: A Saiyan from Universe 6 and Caulifla's best friend.

name: Hit
bio: A legendary assassin from Universe 6 known for his time manipulation abilities.

name: Cabba
bio: A Saiyan from Universe 6 and a member of Caulifla's gang.
